Yes! Graz has a great food scene and there are many traditional restaurants where you can try Austrian dishes. Here are some recommendations:

1. Gasthaus Zum Lindenhof - This family-run restaurant is located in the historic center of Graz and serves traditional Austrian dishes such as Schnitzel, Tafelspitz, and Goulash.

2. Restaurant Augarten - This restaurant is known for its excellent traditional Austrian cuisine, including dishes such as Knödel, Schweinsbraten, and Kaiserschmarrn.

3. Restaurant Der Steirer - This restaurant offers a modern twist on traditional Styrian cuisine, using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. Be sure to try the pumpkin cream soup, a signature dish of the region.

4. Gasthaus Puntigam - Located in the Puntigam district of Graz, this restaurant serves hearty, rustic Austrian dishes such as roasted pork with dumplings and sauerkraut.

5. Zum Guten Hirten - This cozy restaurant is popular with locals and serves traditional Austrian cuisine with a focus on organic, seasonal ingredients. Try the Wiener Schnitzel, which is made with veal from local farms.

I hope this helps and enjoy your trip to Austria!
